product_name: BIC Sport ACE-TEC Original Stand Up Paddle Board - 9' 6"
long_description: Designed as an all-around performer for lightweight riders under 140 lbs., this durable paddle board is also suited as a performance surf board for medium weight riders up to 180 lbs.
short_description: Designed as an all-around performer for lightweight riders under 140 lbs., this durable paddle board is also suited as a performance surf board for medium weight riders up to 180 lbs.
